entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:56 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:56 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
